        public void addUniversity(java.lang.String uniName,
                          java.lang.String uniState,
                          java.lang.String uniLocation,
                          java.lang.String uniControl,
                          int numOfStudents,
                          int percentFemale,
                          int satVerbal,
                          int satMath,
                          int annualExpenses,
                          int percentFinAid,
                          int numApplicants,
                          int percentAdmit,
                          int percentEnrolled,
                          int academicScale,
                          int socialScale,
                          int qOLScale,
                          java.lang.String emphasisStudy1,
                          java.lang.String emphasisStudy2,
                          java.lang.String emphasisStudy3,
                          java.lang.String emphasisStudy4,
                          java.lang.String emphasisStudy5)
        Admin functionality to add University to Database
        Parameters:
        uniName - - Name of University
        uniState - - State University is in
        uniLocation - - Location of University
        uniControl - - Control of University
        numOfStudents - - Number of Students at University
        percentFemale - - Percentage of females at University
        satVerbal - - Average SAT Verbal score
        satMath - - Average SAT Math score
        annualExpenses - - Annual expenses at University
        percentFinAid - - Percentage of Financial Aid given out
        numApplicants - - Number of Applicants at University
        percentAdmit - - Percent of people admitted to University
        percentEnrolled - - Percent of people enrolled at University
        academicScale - - Academic scale of University
        socialScale - - Social scale of University
        qOLScale - - Quality of Life Scale of University
        emphasisStudy1 - - Emphasis 1 of University
        emphasisStudy2 - - Emphasis 2 of University
        emphasisStudy3 - - Emphasis 3 of University
        emphasisStudy4 - - Emphasis 4 of University
        emphasisStudy5 - - Emphasis 5 of University
